short_description.en: $200 rebate for DIY attic insulation and air sealing, must meet R42 insulation level.
short_description.es: Un reembolso de $200 por aislamiento térmico y sellado hermético del ático realizado por usted mismo, debe cumplir el nivel de aislamiento R42.

equipment_standards_restrictions: Insulation level of R42 or greater
equipment_capacity_restrictions: At least 600 sq ft of attic area must be improved
contractor_restrictions: DIY installations, consult with a Trade Ally contractor if needed
other_restrictions: Only for living spaces, not for new construction/additions, must be a customer of a participating utility
stacking_details: Cannot be claimed on another Focus on Energy application, one rebate per type of improvement
financing_details: Rebate may not exceed the total purchase price of the improvement

short_description.en: Instant discounts starting at $300 for ENERGY STAR® certified electric heat pump water heaters.
short_description.es: Descuentos instantáneos a partir de $300 para calentadores de agua eléctricos con bomba de calor y certificación ENERGY STAR®.

equipment_standards_restrictions: Must be ENERGY STAR® certified electric heat pump water heater
other_restrictions: Must be completed along with Trade Ally contractor installed attic insulation improvements.

short_description.en: Up to $500 rebate for residential solar PV systems, additional $500 for rural areas.
short_description.es: Un reembolso de hasta $500 para sistemas solares fotovoltaicos residenciales, $500 adicionales para zonas rurales.

equipment_standards_restrictions: Must select qualified models from Solar Electric Qualified Equipment List
equipment_capacity_restrictions: System capacity must be 0.5 kWDC or greater
contractor_restrictions: Must be installed by a professional contractor with a valid Wisconsin State professional contractor's license
other_restrictions: System must be grid-tied, installed behind the meter, and purchased new. Rebate cannot exceed cost to customer.
stacking_details: Focus on Energy will only pay one rebate per site or meter per calendar year.

short_description.en: $50 rebate for qualified smart thermostats. Available as instant discounts in the online marketplace or as rebates.
short_description.es: Un reembolso de $50 para termostatos inteligentes que reúnan los requisitos. Disponibles como descuentos instantáneos en el mercado en línea o como reembolsos.

other_restrictions: Cannot be resale, leased, rebuilt, rented, from insurance claims, warranty, won as prize, or purchased for resale.

short_description.en: $1,000 rebate for air source heat pumps replacing natural gas or electric resistance.
short_description.es: Un reembolso de $1,000 para bombas de calor con fuente de aire que sustituyan a las de gas natural o resistencia eléctrica.

equipment_standards_restrictions:
Ducted 15.2 SEER2 | 10.0 EER2 | 8.1 HSPF2 | 1.75 COP at 5°

Ductless 16.0 SEER2 | 9.0 EER2 | 9.5 HSPF2 | 1.75 COP at 5°

short_description.en: $400 rebate for air source heat pumps replacing propane, oil, existing heat pump, etc.
short_description.es: Un reembolso de $400 para bombas de calor de fuente de aire que sustituyan a las de propano, gasóleo, bombas de calor existentes, etc.

equipment_standards_restrictions:
Ducted 15.2 SEER2 | 10.0 EER2 | 8.1 HSPF2 | 1.75 COP at 5°

Ductless 16.0 SEER2 | 9.0 EER2 | 9.5 HSPF2 | 1.75 COP at 5°

short_description.en: $750 rebate for certified geothermal heat pumps without natural gas service or $1000 with natural gas service.
short_description.es: Un reembolso de $750 para bombas de calor geotérmicas certificadas sin servicio de gas natural o de $1,000 con servicio de gas natural.

other_restrictions: Must be completed along with Trade Ally contractor installed attic insulation improvements.

short_description.en: Up to $675 rebate for ENERGY STAR® Qualified Air Sealing, assessment required.
short_description.es: Un reembolso de hasta $675 para el sellado hermético con certificación ENERGY STAR®, pero se requiere una evaluación.

contractor_restrictions: Must be installed by a participating insulation Trade Ally contractor
other_restrictions: Must be a customer of a participating utility, 51% of home's heating from participating utility

short_description.es: Cargador de VE inteligente gratuito (con un valor de $1,100) para usuarios que adquieran un VE y cumplan los requisitos.

contractor_restrictions: Members are responsible for installation costs
other_restrictions: Must participate in load management program; Smart Charger has a 3-year parts warranty

stacking_details: Rebate not allowed for a measure and a component of that measure.

other_restrictions: Must be installed on cooperative's lines and purchased in 2024. Special rates and monthly credit recipients not eligible.

short_description.en: $500/ton rebate for geothermal heat pumps.
short_description.es: Un reembolso de $500/tonelada para bombas de calor geotérmicas.

other_restrictions: Incentive not to exceed equipment cost. Must be connected to PPCS load management system.

short_description.en: $25 rebate for ENERGY STAR® clothes dryers.
short_description.es: Un reembolso de $25 para secadoras de ropa ENERGY STAR®.

short_description.en: Up to $600 incentive for residential high efficiency water heaters, depending on capacity. UEF must be at least .88.
short_description.es: Incentivo de hasta $600 para calentadores de agua residenciales de alta eficiencia, en función de la capacidad. El UEF debe ser de al menos .88.

other_restrictions: Must be installed on cooperative's lines and connected to the PPCS load management system.

short_description.en: $600 incentive for integrated heat pump water heaters. UEF must be at least 2.20.
short_description.es: Incentivo de $600 para calentadores de agua integrados con bomba de calor. El UEF debe ser de al menos 2.20.

other_restrictions: Must be installed on cooperative's lines and connected to the PPCS load management system.

short_description.en: $300/ton rebate for central ducted air source heat pumps. SEER2 14.3+, HSPF2 7.5+ OR SEER 15+, HSPF 8.8+.
short_description.es: Un reembolso de $300/tonelada para bombas de calor de fuente de aire con ductos centrales. SEER2 14.3+, HSPF2 7.5+ O SEER 15+, HSPF 8.8+.

other_restrictions: Incentive not to exceed equipment cost. Must be connected to PPCS load management system.

short_description.en: $300/ton rebate for ductless mini-split heat pumps. SEER2 14.3+, HSPF2 7.5+ OR SEER 15+, HSPF 8.8+.
short_description.es: Un reembolso de $300/tonelada para bombas de calor sin ductos mini-splits. SEER2 14.3+, HSPF2 7.5+ O SEER 15+, HSPF 8.8+.

other_restrictions: Incentive not to exceed equipment cost. Must be connected to PPCS load management system.

short_description.en: $25 incentive for induction ranges.
short_description.es: Incentivo de $25 para estufas con parrilla de inducción.

short_description.en: $25 for smart thermostats enrolled in Load Management Program.
short_description.es: $25 para termostatos inteligentes inscritos en el Programa de Manejo de Cargas.

equipment_standards_restrictions: Honeywell or Emerson brand, enrolled in Load Management Program
other_restrictions: Incentive not to exceed equipment cost. Must be connected to PPCS load management system.

short_description.en: Up to $500 for audit-recommended energy efficiency improvements.
short_description.es: Hasta $500 para mejoras de eficiencia energética recomendadas por la auditoría.

other_restrictions: Improvement must be from audit arranged by cooperative or approved partner. Cannot exceed cost of improvements.
stacking_details: If another incentive is available, only that incentive applies. One incentive every 5 years per member.
financing_details: Contact cooperative for details. Funds are limited.

short_description.en: $800 rebate for smart EV chargers with integrated metering.
short_description.es: Un reembolso de $800 para cargadores inteligentes de VEs con medidor integrado.

other_restrictions: Must be purchased from Polk-Burnett and installed on Polk-Burnett electric lines. Must be connected to load management.

short_description.en: $500/ton rebate for geothermal heat pumps, may qualify for off-peak rates.
short_description.es: Un reembolso de $500/tonelada para bombas de calor geotérmicas, puede tener derecho a tarifas reducidas.

other_restrictions: Rebate cannot exceed cost of efficiency equipment. Must be installed on Polk-Burnett's lines.

short_description.en: $25 rebate for ENERGY STAR® clothes dryers.
short_description.es: Un reembolso de $25 para secadoras de ropa ENERGY STAR®.

short_description.en: $300 rebate for integrated heat pump water heaters with UEF 2.20+.
short_description.es: Un reembolso de $300 para calentadores de agua integrados con bomba de calor y FUE 2.20+.

other_restrictions: Equipment must be installed on Polk-Burnett's lines and purchased new.
stacking_details: Rebate not to exceed cost of electric heat pump water heater.

short_description.en: $300/ton rebate for air source & mini-split heat pumps, SEER2 14.3+, HSPF2 7.5+.
short_description.es: Un reembolso de $300/tonelada para bombas de calor de fuente de aire y mini-splits, SEER2 14.3+, HSPF2 7.5+.

equipment_standards_restrictions: SEER2 14.3 or greater, HSPF2 7.5 or greater
other_restrictions: Rebate cannot exceed cost of efficiency equipment. Must be installed on Polk-Burnett's lines.

short_description.en: $25 rebate for induction ranges.
short_description.es: Un reembolso de $25 para estufas de parrilla de inducción.

equipment_standards_restrictions: Most glass tops are NOT inductive - Only inductive technology qualifies

short_description.en: $200/kW solar PV rebate, capped at $600 per account.
short_description.es: Reembolso de $200/kW de energía solar fotovoltaica, con un tope de $600 por cuenta.

equipment_standards_restrictions: PV solar equipment must be UL listed
other_restrictions: Equipment must be connected to Polk-Burnett's grid in 2024. System needs to be inspected by a commercial electrical inspector.
stacking_details: Rebate capped at $600 per account.

short_description.en: 30% of cost for air infiltration reduction measures, up to $1,000.
short_description.es: 30% del costo para medidas de reducción de la infiltración de aire, hasta $1,000.

other_restrictions: Pre-test and post-test by certified energy rater required. Building must be at least 10 years old and on Polk Burnett's electric lines.
stacking_details: Rebate limited to one per member within a year from the date of the first home test, unless prior agreement with the rater.

short_description.en: Up to $600/ton for geothermal heat pumps.
short_description.es: Hasta $600/tonelada para bombas de calor geotérmicas.

other_restrictions: Incentive not to exceed equipment cost. Cannot claim for measure and its component.

short_description.en: $50 rebate for ENERGY STAR® clothes dryers.
short_description.es: Un reembolso de $50 para secadoras de ropa ENERGY STAR®.

short_description.en: Up to $1,000 rebate for water heaters, depending on capacity and efficiency. Must be load controlled.
short_description.es: Un reembolso de hasta $1,000 para calentadores de agua, en función de capacidad y eficiencia. Deben ser de carga controlada.

other_restrictions: Must be controlled by cooperative's load control program; Incentive not to exceed the equipment cost.

short_description.en: $300 rebate for integrated heat pump water heaters. UEF must be at least 2.2.
short_description.es: Un reembolso de $300 para calentadores de agua integrados con bomba de calor. El UEF debe ser de al menos 2,.2.

other_restrictions: Incentive not to exceed the equipment cost.

short_description.en: Up to $400/ton for air source & mini-split heat pumps with SEER2 14.3+ or SEER 15+.
short_description.es: Hasta $400/tonelada para bombas de calor de fuente de aire y mini-split con SEER2 14.3+ o SEER 15+.

other_restrictions: Incentive not to exceed equipment cost. Cannot claim for measure and its component.

short_description.en: $50 rebate for induction ranges.
short_description.es: Rebaja de $50 para estufas de parrilla de inducción.

short_description.en: $500 incentive for qualified Solar Electric (PV) System installations.
short_description.es: Incentivo de $500 para instalaciones de sistemas de energía solar eléctrica (FV) que cumplan los requisitos.

equipment_standards_restrictions: Must be installed within 90 degrees of due south, tilt 10-50 degrees, less than 10% shading
contractor_restrictions: Must be installed by a qualified contractor
other_restrictions: Incentive not to exceed equipment cost, must be new equipment installed on cooperative's lines
stacking_details: Incentive may not exceed the equipment cost

short_description.en: $75 incentive for WiFi enabled smart thermostats.
short_description.es: Incentivo de $75 para termostatos inteligentes con WiFi.

other_restrictions: Incentive not to exceed equipment cost. Cannot claim for measure and its component.

short_description.en: Up to $500 for audit-recommended energy efficiency improvements.
short_description.es: Hasta $500 para mejoras de eficiencia energética recomendadas por la auditoría.

other_restrictions: Improvements must be from audit recommendations. One incentive every 5 years per member.
stacking_details: If another incentive is available, only that incentive applies, not both.

short_description.en: $400 rebate for EV chargers with load control.
short_description.es: Un reembolso de $400 para cargadores de VEs con control de carga.

other_restrictions: Must be installed on cooperative's lines and not exceed the EV charger cost.
stacking_details: Incentive not to exceed the EV charger cost.

short_description.en: $800 rebate for smart EV chargers with integrated metering and load control.
short_description.es: Un reembolso de $800 para cargadores inteligentes de VEs con medidor integrado y control de carga.

other_restrictions: May require additional load control device if cellular data does not transmit from installation site.
stacking_details: Incentive not to exceed the EV charger cost.

short_description.en: $500/ton rebate for geothermal heat pumps.
short_description.es: Un reembolso de $500/tonelada para bombas de calor geotérmicas.

other_restrictions: Incentive not to exceed equipment cost. Cannot claim for measure and its component.

short_description.en: $25 rebate for ENERGY STAR® clothes dryers.
short_description.es: Un reembolso de $25 para secadoras de ropa ENERGY STAR®.

short_description.en: Up to $300 rebate for residential high efficiency water heaters, depending on capacity. UEF must be at least .88.
short_description.es: Un reembolso de hasta $300 para calentadores de agua residenciales de alta eficiencia, dependiendo de la capacidad. El UEF debe ser de al menos .88.

other_restrictions: Incentive not to exceed the equipment cost. Must be installed on cooperative's lines.

short_description.en: $300 rebate for integrated heat pump water heaters, UEF at least 2.00, controlled by Cooperative's load control program.
short_description.es: Un reembolso de $300 para calentadores de agua integrados con bomba de calor, UEF de al menos 2.00, regulados por el programa de control de carga de la Cooperativa.

other_restrictions: Incentive not to exceed the equipment cost. Must be installed on cooperative's lines and controlled by Cooperative's load control program.

short_description.en: $300 rebate for air source & mini-split heat pumps. SEER2 14.3+, HSPF2 7.5+ or SEER 15+, HSPF 8.8+.
short_description.es: Un reembolso de $300 para bombas de calor de fuente de aire y mini-splits. SEER2 14.3+, HSPF2 7.5+ o SEER 15+, HSPF 8.8+.

other_restrictions: Incentive not to exceed equipment cost. Cannot claim for measure and its component.

short_description.en: $25 rebate for ENERGY STAR® induction ranges.
short_description.es: Un reembolso de $25 para estufas con parrilla de inducción ENERGY STAR®.

short_description.en: $1,300 rebate for cold climate air source heat pumps replacing natural gas or electric resistance.
short_description.es: Un reembolso de $1,300 para bombas de calor con fuente de aire para climas fríos que sustituyan a los de resistencia eléctrica o de gas natural.

equipment_standards_restrictions:
Ducted 15.2 SEER2 | 10.0 EER2 | 8.1 HSPF2 | 1.75 COP at 5°

Ductless 16.0 SEER2 | 9.0 EER2 | 9.5 HSPF2 | 1.75 COP at 5°

short_description.en: $500 rebate for cold climate air source heat pumps replacing propane, oil, existing heat pump, etc.
short_description.es: Un reembolso de $500 para bombas de calor con fuente de aire de clima frío que sustituyan a las de propano, gasóleo, bomba de calor existente, etc.

equipment_standards_restrictions:
Ducted 15.2 SEER2 | 10.0 EER2 | 8.1 HSPF2 | 1.75 COP at 5°

Ductless 16.0 SEER2 | 9.0 EER2 | 9.5 HSPF2 | 1.75 COP at 5°

short_description.en: Rebate up to 100% of the cost of whole-home improvements, based on the modeled energy savings or measured energy savings achieved by the retrofit.
short_description.es: Un reembolso de hasta 100% del coste, basado en el ahorro de energía simulado o en el ahorro de energía medido logrado por el reacondicionamiento

contractor_restrictions: Must have received an assessment by an IRA Registered Contractor prior to completion of any work
other_restrictions: For renters of single-family dwelling units, tenants must verify their income eligibility and if qualified, the landlord is responsible for initiating the work and assuming the associated costs.
